                "pe": "PE",

            };

            window.AirlineCountryCode = langCodeMap[window.languageCode] || "CO";
            window.YieldrTrackingLang = window.languageCode &amp;&amp; ~window.languageCode.indexOf("en") ? "en-US" : "es-CO";

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {
            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) {
            }
            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {

        $(".currentLanguage").on('keydown', function (event) {
            if (event.keyCode === 13 || event.keyCode === 32 || (event.keyCode === 40 &amp;&amp; !$('.languages').is(":visible"))) {
                $(this).click();
                return false;
            }
            if ((event.keyCode === 40 &amp;&amp; $('.languages').is(":visible"))) {
                event.preventDefault();
                $(".languages").find(".language").not("current").first().focus();
            }
            return true;
        });

        $('.currentLanguage').click(function () {
            var parent = $(this).closest('.languageSelectionWrapper');
            var languages = $('.languages');
            if (languages.is(":visible")) {
                parent.removeClass('open');
                languages.velocity("slideUp");
            } else {
                parent.addClass('open');
                languages.velocity("slideDown");
            }
        });

        $(".countries").find(".country.current").hide();
        $(".currentCountry").on('keydown', function (event) {
            if (event.keyCode === 13 || event.keyCode === 32 || (event.keyCode === 40 &amp;&amp; !$('.countries').is(":visible"))) {
                $(this).click();
                return false;
            }
            if ((event.keyCode === 40 &amp;&amp; $('.countries').is(":visible"))) {
                event.preventDefault();
                $(".countries").find(".country").not("current").first().focus();
            }
            return true;
        });

        $('.currentCountry').click(function () {
            var parent = $(this).closest('.countrySelectionWrapper');
            var countries = $('.countries');
            if (countries.is(":visible")) {
                parent.removeClass('open');
                countries.velocity("slideUp");
            } else {
                parent.addClass('open');
                countries.velocity("slideDown");
            }
        });
    });
</script>

    function OpenChat(link) {
        var height = parseInt(window.innerHeight) * .8;
        window.open(link, "chat", "width=800,height=" + height);

<script src="https://h.online-metrix.net/fp/tags.js?org_id=k8vif92e&amp;session_id=vivaairff7cf06b-a643-44de-943f-f5993e8868c8" type="text/javascript"></script>

<noscript>
    &lt;iframe style="width: 100px; height: 100px; border: 0; position:absolute; top: -5000px;" src="https://h.online-metrix.net/fp/tags.js?org_id=k8vif92e&amp;session_id=vivaairff7cf06b-a643-44de-943f-f5993e8868c8"&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;

        <script type="text/javascript">

        var criteriaModel;
        $(document).ready(function() {

            var criteria = {
                SearchType: 'Month',
                AvailType: '',
                IsReturnTrip: true,
                Adults: '1',
                Children: '2',
                Infants: '1',
                FareDesignator: '',
                HaveErrors: false,
                IsChangeBooking: false,
                Currency: 'COP',
                ConvertedCurrency: 'USD',
                OutFlightNumber: '',
                InFlightNumber: '',
                OutClassCode: '',
                InClassCode: '',
                ProductClass: '',
                Flights: [{"DepartureAirport":"MDE","ArrivalAirport":"BOG","DepartureDate":"\/Date(1549778400000)\/","DepartureDateString":"2019-02-10"},{"DepartureAirport":"BOG","ArrivalAirport":"MDE","DepartureDate":"\/Date(1552280400000)\/","DepartureDateString":"2019-03-11"}]
            };

            for (var i = 0; i &lt; criteria.Flights.length; i++) {
                var flight = criteria.Flights[i];
                flight.DepartureDate = moment(flight.DepartureDate).toDate();
                if (flight.DepartureDateString !== undefined &amp;&amp; flight.DepartureDateString !== null) {
                    var parsedDate = moment(flight.DepartureDateString, "YYYY-MM-DD").toDate();
                    if (parsedDate.getTime() !== flight.DepartureDate.getTime()) {
                        flight.DepartureDate = parsedDate;
                    }
                }
            }

            var options = {
                haveErrorsField: $("#LastSearch_HaveErrors"),
                criteria: criteria,
                departureDate: $('#DepartureDate'),
                returnDate: $('#ReturnDate'),
                language: 'co'
            };

            criteriaModel = new FlightCriteria(options);
        });
        </script>

<script id="availability-product-header-out-template" type="text/html">
        &lt;div class="product-class-header-container"&gt;
        &lt;div class="col-xs-5 product-spacer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;div class="col-xs-7 product-headers" data-bind="with: ProductClassPopupOut"&gt;
            &lt;div class="product-class-header basic" data-bind="event: { mouseover: showProductClassDetails, mouseout: hideProductClassDetails }"&gt;
                &lt;span class="hidden-xs hidden-sm"&gt;Viva&lt;/span&gt;
                &lt;span class="visible-xs visible-sm"&gt;Basic &lt;a href="#" data-bind="click: $parent.FullscreenProductClassDetailsPopup.open" class="glyphicon glyphicon-info-sign details-link"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;

                &lt;div class="hidden-xs hidden-sm"&gt;
                    &lt;i class="baggage-6kg"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;

        $(function() {
            ezy.views.flight.norefundpopup().init({
                translations: {
                    NoRefundPopupAcceptLabel: "Acepto",
                    NoRefundPopupAcceptTitle: "Acepto",
                    NoRefundPopupContent: "\u003cp style=\"text-align: center;\"\u003e\u003cspan class=\"largeRed\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eLa siguiente informaci\u0026oacute;n, es\u0026nbsp;muy importante para tu viaje:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cul\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eEl equipaje permitido sin costo por Viva Air, es una \u0026uacute;nica pieza (art\u0026iacute;culo personal) de m\u0026aacute;ximo 10\u0026nbsp;kg y \u003cstrong\u003e40x35x25 \u003c/strong\u003ecm. Exceder las medidas/peso del mismo tendr\u0026aacute; un costo adicional.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eSi elegiste la opci\u0026oacute;n de hacer web check-in, recuerda que el pase de abordar\u0026nbsp;est\u0026aacute; disponible para vuelos nacionales entre\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003e72 y 2\u0026nbsp;ho\u003cstrong\u003era\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cstrong\u003es\u003c/strong\u003e antes de la salida programada del \u0026nbsp;vuelo. Si no presentas el pase de abordar impreso y no compraste el servicio de check-in en aeropuerto, la impresi\u0026oacute;n en el counter tendr\u0026aacute; un cobro adicional.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eNuestros m\u0026oacute;dulos de atenci\u0026oacute;n para proceso de check-in, reclamo de pase de abordar con costo adicional\u0026nbsp;y entrega equipaje se cierra 40\u0026nbsp;minutos antes de la salida programada para vuelos nacionales y 60 minutos para internacionales.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eTeniendo en cuenta que\u0026nbsp;todas nuestras tarifas son promocionales, cuando no uses un pasaje te devolveremos los impuestos asociados a este y los servicios adicionales adquiridos.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eTodos los cambios realizados luego de pagar la reserva tendr\u0026aacute;n un costo adicional\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eCancelaci\u0026oacute;n con 24 horas despu\u0026eacute;s de la compra:\u003c/strong\u003e (S\u0026oacute;lo para vuelos desde/hacia Estados Unidos): El pasajero podr\u0026aacute; hacer la solicitud de reintegro total dentro de las primeras 24 horas corrientes a la compra, siempre y cuando el vuelo no se encuentre en los siguientes 7 d\u0026iacute;as calendario al realizar la solicitud. Este tipo de reembolso solo aplica para reservas desde/hacia Estados Unidos.\u003cbr /\u003e\r\n\u003cstrong\u003eRetracto:\u003c/strong\u003e El retracto de la compra deber\u0026aacute; ser ejercido a trav\u0026eacute;s de cualquier canal de atenci\u0026oacute;n del vendedor,\u0026nbsp; dentro de las cuarenta y ocho (48) horas corrientes siguientes a la operaci\u0026oacute;n de la compra. El retracto s\u0026oacute;lo podr\u0026aacute; ser ejercido con una anterioridad igual o mayor a 8 d\u0026iacute;as calendario entre el momento de su ejercicio oportuno y la fecha prevista para el inicio de la prestaci\u0026oacute;n del servicio para\u0026nbsp; vuelos nacionales. Para vuelos internacionales, el t\u0026eacute;rmino ser\u0026aacute; igual o mayor a 15 d\u0026iacute;as calendario.\u003cbr /\u003e\r\n\u003cstrong\u003eDesistimiento: \u003c/strong\u003eEl pasajero podr\u0026aacute; desistir del viaje hasta 24 horas antes del inicio del mismo, siempre y cuando el contrato de transporte origine en Colombia. El transportador podr\u0026aacute; retener hasta un 10% del valor de la tarifa, excluyendo tasas, impuestos y tarifa administrativa. Lo anterior no aplicar\u0026aacute; cuando se trate de tarifas promocionales.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eTeniendo en cuenta que todas nuestras tarifas son promocionales, en el momento que no realices tu viaje ser\u0026aacute;n reembolsables \u0026uacute;nicamente las tasas aeroportuarias y los impuestos aplicables de acuerdo al destino. El pasaje y los servicios adicionales adquiridos no son reembolsables.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n"
                },
                DisableFirstNoRefundPopup: false
            });
        });
    </script>



<script type="text/javascript">

    $(document).ready(function () {
        var translations = {
            To: "hacia",
            Stops: "Paradas",
            NoStop: "Directo",
            BaseFare: "Tarifa",

                Monday: "Lunes",

                Thursday: "Jueves",

                Friday: "Viernes",
                FridayShort: "Vie",
                Saturday: "S&amp;#225;bado",
                SaturdayShort: "Sab",
                Sunday: "Domingo",
                SundayShort: "Dom"
            },
            flightSearchNoSchedule: "Lo sentimos, no tenemos vuelos disponibles en la fecha seleccionada",
            flightSearchNoFlights: "Lo sentimos, no hemos encontrado vuelos",
            confirmSelectedFlight: "&amp;#191;Sabes que este vuelo tiene parada(s)?",
            errorMessage: {
                AnErrorOccurred: "Lo sentimos. Se ha presentado un error. Intenta de nuevo",
                Network: "Ha ocurrido un error en la red. Por favor intenta de nuevo",
                FlightValid: "Ha ocurrido un error mientas validamos los vuelos. Por favor intenta de nuevo",
                Internet: "Ha ocurrido un error en la conexi&amp;#243;n. Por favor intenta de nuevo",
                Pricing: "Ha ocurrido un error al calcular la tarifa. Por favor intenta de nuevo.",
                Infant: "Chosen infants is not available on this flight."
            }
        };

        var settings = {
            DaysBeforeCashPayment: "240",
            ExcludedDatesForCustomRibbon: "",
            CustomRibbonClassCode: ""
        };

        var controls = {
        };

        var availabilityNormal = ezy.views.flight.availability.availabilityNormal(criteriaModel);

        availabilityNormal.init({
            searchUrl: "/AsyncAvailability/SearchAsync",
            translations: translations,
            settings: settings,
            controls: controls,
            wrapper: $("#availabilityNormal"),
            getCriteria: criteriaModel.GetCriteria,
            setBoardDate: criteriaModel.SetDepartureDate,
            setReturnDate: criteriaModel.SetReturnDate,
            setBusiness: criteriaModel.SetBusiness,
            flexControl: $('.flex-rb'),
            criteria: criteriaModel.GetCriteria(),
            culture: 'en-US',
            weekSearchEnabled: 'true',
            currentLanguageRoot: 'co',
            nrOfSeats: 3,
            isDomestic: true,
            sessionId: 'ohy1coe1pr5nfbc4x5awxhu0',
            fusionTransactionId: 'ee7ef531-41eb-4730-a2e3-df319fd16565'
        });
    });
</script>



    <div class="col-lg-10 col-md-9">
        <div class="warningContainer" style="text-align: justify;">Este es el precio base que incluye los impuestos, tasas aeroportuarias y los servicios adicionales correspondientes. En el <strong>siguiente paso se agregan</strong> automáticamente los <strong>servicios adicionales restantes</strong>, lo cuales <strong>incrementarán el precio final</strong> de la reserva. Si no deseas alguno de estos servicios, simplemente edítalos y descuéntalos. Haciendo click en continuar, nos <strong>confirmas</strong> que entendiste esta información.  </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
        var availabilityMonth = new ezy.views.flight.availability.availabilityMonth(criteriaModel);

        var options = {
            availabilitySearchUrl: '/AsyncAvailability/GetMonthAvailability',
            translations: {
                to: 'hacia',
                from: 'Desde',
                errorMessages: {
                    error: "Lo sentimos. Se ha presentado un error. Intenta de nuevo",
                    network: "Ha ocurrido un error en la red. Por favor intenta de nuevo"
                },
                warningMessages: {
                    NoFlightsFound: "Lo sentimos, no hemos encontrado vuelos"
                },
                jMonthCalender: {
                    Prev: "Anterior",
                    Next: "Siguiente",
                    Today: "Hoy",
                    days: ["domingo","lunes","martes","miércoles","jueves","viernes","sábado"],
                    daysShort: ["dom","lun","mar","mié","jue","vie","sáb"],
                    daysMin: ["do","lu","ma","mi","ju","vi","sá"],
                    months: ["enero","febrero","marzo","abril","mayo","junio","julio","agosto","septiembre","octubre","noviembre","diciembre",""],
                    monthsShort: ["ene","feb","mar","abr","may","jun","jul","ago","sep","oct","nov","dic"],
                    weekMin: 'Semana',
                    seatsLeft: '&amp;#218;ltimas sillas',
                    twoForOneText: '2X1',
                    from: 'Desde',
                    lowestFare: 'Tarifa m&amp;#225;s baja',
                    soldOut: 'Nuestro vuelo est&amp;#225; lleno',
                    NoFlightsLabel: 'Nuestro vuelo est&amp;#225; lleno',
                    selectDate: 'Select date'
                }
            },
            ShowSeatCount: true,
            ShowTwoForOneLabel: false,
            MaxSeatsLeftQuantity: 10,
            maximumLowestFare: 3,
            wrapper: $("#availabilityMonth"),
            continueButton: $('#monthContinue'),
            returnContainer: $('#availabilityMonth #pnlReturn'),
            useContinueButton: "true",
            getCriteria: criteriaModel.GetCriteria,
            currentLanguageRoot: 'co',
            isDomestic: true,
            sessionId: 'ohy1coe1pr5nfbc4x5awxhu0',
            fusionTransactionId: 'ee7ef531-41eb-4730-a2e3-df319fd16565'
        };

        availabilityMonth.init(options);
    });
</script>

            <!-- /ko -->
        
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' -->
            <div data-bind="text: RowNumber, attr: { 'class': 'seatItem seatNr' + SeatNumber + ' ' + SeatType(), 'data-seat': SeatNumber, 'data-type': SeatType, 'data-exitrow': ExitRow, 'data-extraspace': ExtraSpace }" class="seatItem seatNrnull Aisle" data-type="Aisle">2</div>
            <!-- /ko -->
            
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --><!-- /ko -->

            <!-- ko ifnot: SeatType() === 'Aisle' || SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --><!-- /ko -->
        
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' --><!-- /ko -->
            
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --><!-- /ko -->

            <!-- /ko -->
        
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' --><!-- /ko -->
            
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --><!-- /ko -->

            <!-- ko ifnot: SeatType() === 'Aisle' || SeatType() === 'NoSeat' -->

            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->

        <div data-bind="foreach: Seats">
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' --><!-- /ko -->
            
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --><!-- /ko -->

            <!-- ko ifnot: SeatType() === 'Aisle' || SeatType() === 'NoSeat' -->
            <div data-bind="attr: { 'class': 'seatItem seatNr' + SeatNumber + ' ' + SeatType(), 'data-seat': SeatNumber, 'data-type': SeatType, 'data-exitrow': ExitRow, 'data-extraspace': ExtraSpace, 'data-segment': SegmentNumber },&#10;        click: $root.seating.selectSeat,&#10;        event: { mouseover: $root.seating.showSeatDetails, mouseout: $root.seating.hideSeatDetails },&#10;        css: { Selected: $root.seating.IsSeatSelected($data), InfantAllowed: $root.seating.IsInfantAllowed($data) }" class="seatItem seatNr26A Light" data-seat="26A" data-type="Light" data-segment="1">
            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->
        
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' --><!-- /ko -->
            
            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --><!-- /ko -->

            <!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' --><!-- /ko -->

            <!-- /ko -->
        </div>
    </div>

<script type="text/html" id="seating-passengers-template">
    &lt;div class="seatingPassengerFlights"&gt;

        &lt;!-- ko if: Flight.ShowOutFlightLabel() --&gt;
        &lt;h4&gt;
            Vuelo ida
        &lt;/h4&gt;
        &lt;!-- /ko --&gt;
        &lt;!-- ko if: Flight.ShowInFlightLabel() --&gt;
        &lt;h4&gt;
            Vuelo regreso
        &lt;/h4&gt;
        &lt;!-- /ko --&gt;
        &lt;div class="seatingPassengerFlightHeader" data-bind="click: Flight.Expand, css: { open: Flight.Open(), departure: Flight.IsDeparture(), return: !Flight.IsDeparture() }"&gt;
            &lt;i data-bind="css: { departure: Flight.IsDeparture(), return: !Flight.IsDeparture() }"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;
            &lt;span data-bind="text: Flight.Route"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
            &lt;i data-bind="css: { readmore: !Flight.Open(), readless: Flight.Open() }"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;div data-bind="foreach: $root.passengerDetails.passengers, slideVisible: Flight.Open() "&gt;
            &lt;div data-bind="if: type() !== 'INF'"&gt;
                &lt;div class="passenger seatPassenger" data-bind="click: $root.seating.selectPassenger.bind($parent), attr: { id: 'passengerSeating' + passengerNumber() }, css: { selected: $root.seating.selectedPassenger() === passengerNumber() &amp;&amp; $root.seating.selectedFlightKey() === Flight.FlightKey }"&gt;
                    &lt;div class="col-xs-8 passengerName"&gt;
                        &lt;span class="fullName" data-bind="text: fullName"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
                    &lt;/div&gt;

                    &lt;div class="col-xs-4 column-wrapper seatingOptions"&gt;
                        &lt;div class="passengerSeat" data-bind="visible: $root.seating.shouldSelectSeat(Flight, $data)"&gt;
                            &lt;span class="removeSelectedSeat" data-bind="click: $root.seating.removeSeatFromPassenger.bind($parent), 
                                  css: { invisible: $root.seating.getSelectedSeatNumber(Flight, passengerNumber()) === '' || $root.seating.isInChangeBooking() }"&gt;✖&lt;/span&gt;

                            &lt;span class="selectedSeatNumber" data-bind="text: $root.seating.getSelectedSeatNumber(Flight, passengerNumber()), 
                                  css: { noSeatSelected: $root.seating.getSelectedSeatNumber(Flight, passengerNumber()) === '' }"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;                            
                        &lt;/div&gt;

                        &lt;div class="passengerSeat noSeatsAvailable" data-bind="visible: !$root.seating.shouldSelectSeat(Flight, $data)"&gt;Tu asiento se asignará en el aeropuerto&lt;/div&gt;

                        &lt;div class="clear"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
                    &lt;/div&gt;
                    &lt;div class="clear"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;div class="clear"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
</script>
<script type="text/html" id="seating-seatmap-template">
    &lt;div data-bind="visible: $root.seating.selectedFlightKey() === Flight.FlightKey" class="seating-container"&gt;
        &lt;div class="seatmap-route seating-sticky top" data-bind="css: {departure: Flight.IsDeparture(), return: !Flight.IsDeparture()}"&gt;
            &lt;span data-bind="text: Flight.Route"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;div data-bind="event: { scroll: $root.seating.onSeatmapScroll }, attr: { 'class': 'seats ' + 'seating' + Flight.DashedFlightKey }"&gt;
            &lt;div data-bind="template: { name: 'seating-seatrow-template', foreach: Flight.SeatRows, as: 'seatRows' }, attr: { 'class': 'background-seatmap seatmap-' + Flight.AircraftType + '-es' }"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;div class="seating-select-for seating-sticky bottom" data-bind="visible: $root.seating.selectedPassenger() !== -1"&gt;
                Selecciona un asiento para: 
                &lt;span data-bind="text: $root.seating.SelectedPassengerName()"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="seating-seatrow-template">
    &lt;div data-bind="if: Seats()[0].ExitRow" class="exitRowText"&gt;Salida de Emergencia&lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;div class="seatrow" data-bind="css: { 'exitrow': Seats()[0].ExitRow } "&gt;
        &lt;div data-bind="foreach: Seats"&gt;
            &lt;!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'Aisle' --&gt;
            &lt;div data-bind="text: RowNumber, attr: { 'class': 'seatItem seatNr' + SeatNumber + ' ' + SeatType(), 'data-seat': SeatNumber, 'data-type': SeatType, 'data-exitrow': ExitRow, 'data-extraspace': ExtraSpace }"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;!-- /ko --&gt;
            
            &lt;!-- ko if: SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --&gt;
            &lt;div data-bind="attr: { 'class': 'seatItem ' + SeatType(), 'data-seat': SeatNumber, 'data-type': SeatType, 'data-exitrow': ExitRow, 'data-extraspace': ExtraSpace }"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;!-- /ko --&gt;

            &lt;!-- ko ifnot: SeatType() === 'Aisle' || SeatType() === 'NoSeat' --&gt;
            &lt;div data-bind="attr: { 'class': 'seatItem seatNr' + SeatNumber + ' ' + SeatType(), 'data-seat': SeatNumber, 'data-type': SeatType, 'data-exitrow': ExitRow, 'data-extraspace': ExtraSpace, 'data-segment': SegmentNumber },
        click: $root.seating.selectSeat,
        event: { mouseover: $root.seating.showSeatDetails, mouseout: $root.seating.hideSeatDetails },
        css: { Selected: $root.seating.IsSeatSelected($data), InfantAllowed: $root.seating.IsInfantAllowed($data) }"&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;!-- /ko --&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
</script>    <!-- /ko --><div id="extras-collapse-container" class="open"><div class="header" id="extras-collapse-header"><h3 tabindex="0">Servicios Adicionales</h3><div class="editOption"><i class="edit"></i></div></div><!-- ko with: getExtraByType('FCExtrasHandLuggage') --><div class="extras fcextrashandluggage box" data-bind="applyBindings: GetExtraContainerBindings()" id="ExtraContainerFCExtrasHandLuggage">

<div class="extrasHead" data-extra-type="ExtrasSpecialLuggage" data-preselected="false">
        <i class="icon"></i>
    <div class="extrasHeader">

        <h3 tabindex="0">Equipaje especial</h3>

            <div class="titleText">¿No quieres dejar en casa a tu mascota (perro o gato), instrumento musical o equipo deportivo? Compra este servicio y llévalos contigo.</div>

        <div class="clear"></div>
    </div>

        <button class="readMore" data-bind="visible: $parent.edit(), click: ExpandExtra" title="Leer más Equipaje especial">
            <span class="normalText" data-bind="visible: Open()" style="display: none;">Leer menos</span>
            <i class="readless" data-bind="visible: Open" style="display: none;"></i>

            <span class="normalText" data-bind="visible: !Open()">Leer más</span>
            <i class="readmore" data-bind="visible: !Open()"></i>
        </button>

    <div tabindex="0" id="infoContainerExtrasSpecialLuggage" class="extraDescription" data-bind="slideVisible: Open" style="display: none;">
        <p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="normalBlack"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"><strong>Mascotas: </strong>Para los amantes de los animales, Viva Air creó el servicio de transporte de mascotas, con el cual permitimos el transporte de tu mascota (perros y gatos) únicamente en la cabina del avión. La mascota debe ir en un guacal de tela y el peso total de la mascota y el guacal no debe estar por encima de los <strong>10 kg ni medir más de 55x35x25 cm</strong>. Viva Air no presta el servicio de guacales o servicio de animales en bodega. </span><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">En rutas internacionales NO está permitido el transporte  de </span><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">mascotas, excepto perros lazarrillo o animales de compañía emocional. </span><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-decoration: underline;">El servicio adicional de mascotas está disponible solo para vuelos nacionales.</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="normalBlack"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"></span><span style="font-size: small; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Equipos deportivos en la bodega del avión:</strong> En Viva Air permitimos el transporte de los siguientes artículos deportivos: </span><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">equipo de golf, de pesca, buceo, bicicletas no motorizadas de un solo asiento, bolos, para esquiar, de arquería, de campamento, hockey o lacrosse, kitesurf o kiteboard, raquetas (2), remos (2), paracaídas, tacos de billar, surf, windsurf (max. 300 cm de largo). Los mismos serán transportados en la bodega del avión </span><span style="font-size: small; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">y no debe exceder los 32 kg de peso ni los 319 cm lineales (los cuales corresponden a la suma del largo, ancho y alto del equipo).</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="normalBlack"><span style="font-size: small; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Instrumento musical en la bodega del avión</strong> Si tu instrumento musical no excede los 32 kg ni los 319 cm lineales, los cuales corresponden a la suma del largo, ancho y alto del equipaje, compra este servicio y transporta tu instrumento en la bodega del avión. </span></span></p>

    </div>
</div>

                <script type="text/javascript">
                    $(function () {
                        window.ezy.ExtraViewModels = window.ezy.ExtraViewModels || [];
                        var extraModel = ezy.InsuranceViewModel();
                        extraModel.Type = "FCExtrasInsurance";

                            extraModel.ShowInContainer("extrasForm");

                        window.ezy.ExtraViewModels.push(extraModel);
                        if (window.ExtrasViewModel) {
                            window.ExtrasViewModel.extras.push(extraModel);
                        }
                    });
                </script>

                            window.ExtrasViewModel.extras.push(extraModel);
                        }
                    });
                </script>

        $(function() {
            var Country = function(item) {
                var inner = { };
                inner.name = item.Name;
                inner.code = item.Code;
                return inner;
            };

            var State = function(item) {
                var inner = { };
                inner.name = item.Name;
                inner.code = item.Code;
                inner.countryCode = item.CountryCode;
                return inner;
            };

            var CreditCard = function(item) {
                var inner = { };
                inner.name = item.Name;
                inner.code = item.Code;
                return inner;
            };

            var Installment = function (installment) {
                var inner = { };
                inner.name = installment + " Mes(es)";
                inner.installment = installment;
                return inner;
            }

                var inner = { };

of"},{"Code":"QA","Name":"Qatar, State of"},{"Code":"RE","Name":"Reunion"},{"Code":"RO","Name":"Romania, Socialist Republic of"},{"Code":"RS","Name":"Serbia"},{"Code":"RU","Name":"Russian Federation"},{"Code":"RW","Name":"Rwanda, Rwandese Republic"},{"Code":"SA","Name":"Saudi Arabia, Kingdom of"},{"Code":"SB","Name":"Solomon Islands"},{"Code":"SC","Name":"Seychelles, Republic of"},{"Code":"SD","Name":"Sudan, Democratic Republic of the"},{"Code":"SE","Name":"Sweden, Kingdom of"},{"Code":"SG","Name":"Singapore, Republic of"},{"Code":"SH","Name":"St. Helena"},{"Code":"SI","Name":"Slovenia"},{"Code":"SJ","Name":"Svalbard \u0026 Jan Mayen Islands"},{"Code":"SK","Name":"Slovakia (Slovak Republic)"},{"Code":"SL","Name":"Sierra Leone, Republic of"},{"Code":"SM","Name":"San Marino, Republic of"},{"Code":"SN","Name":"Senegal, Republic of"},{"Code":"SO","Name":"Somalia, Somali Republic"},{"Code":"SR","Name":"Suriname, Republic of"},{"Code":"SS","Name":"South Sudan"},{"Code":"ST","Name":"Sao Tome and Principe, Democratic Republic of"},{"Code":"SV","Name":"El Salvador, Republic of"},{"Code":"SX","Name":"Sint Maarten"},{"Code":"SY","Name":"Syrian Arab Republic"},{"Code":"SZ","Name":"Swaziland, Kingdom of"},{"Code":"TC","Name":"Turks and Caicos Islands"},{"Code":"TD","Name":"Chad, Republic of"},{"Code":"TG","Name":"Togo, Togolese Republic"},{"Code":"TH","Name":"Thailand, Kingdom of"},{"Code":"TJ","Name":"Tajikistan"},{"Code":"TL","Name":"Timor-Leste, Democratic Republic of"},{"Code":"TM","Name":"Turkmenistan"},{"Code":"TN","Name":"Tunisia, Republic of"},{"Code":"TO","Name":"Tonga, Kingdom of"},{"Code":"TR","Name":"Turkey, Republic of"},{"Code":"TT","Name":"Trinidad and Tobago, Republic of"},{"Code":"TV","Name":"Tuvalu"},{"Code":"TW","Name":"Taiwan"},{"Code":"TZ","Name":"Tanzania, United Republic of"},{"Code":"UA","Name":"Ukraine"},{"Code":"UG","Name":"Uganda, Republic of"},{"Code":"UM","Name":"United States Minor Outlying Islands"},{"Code":"US","Name":"Estados Unidos"},{"Code":"UY","Name":"Uruguay, Eastern Republic of"},{"Code":"UZ","Name":"Uzbekistan"},{"Code":"VC","Name":"St. Vincent and the Grenadines"},{"Code":"VE","Name":"Venezuela, Bolivarian Republic of"},{"Code":"VG","Name":"British Virgin Islands"},{"Code":"VI","Name":"US Virgin Islands"},{"Code":"VN","Name":"Vietnam"},{"Code":"VU","Name":"Vanuatu"},{"Code":"WF","Name":"Wallis and Futuna Islands"},{"Code":"WS","Name":"Samoa, Independent State of"},{"Code":"YE","Name":"Yemen"},{"Code":"YT","Name":"Mayotte"},{"Code":"ZA","Name":"South Africa, Republic of"},{"Code":"ZM","Name":"Zambia, Republic of"},{"Code":"ZW","Name":"Zimbabwe"}];
                var creditCardOptions = [{"Name":"Visa","Code":"VI","MaxInstallments":36},{"Name":"Mastercard","Code":"MC","MaxInstallments":36},{"Name":"Diners","Code":"DN","MaxInstallments":36}];

                inner.selectedCountry = ko.observable(window.AirlineCountryCode);
                inner.selectedState = ko.observable("");
                inner.selectedCreditCard = ko.observable("");
                inner.selectedInstallment = ko.observable(new Installment(1));

                inner.phoneNumberSelectorValue = ko.observable("");
                inner.phoneNumberSelectorValue.subscribe(function() {
                    inner.updatePhoneNumber();
                });

                inner.updatePhoneNumber = function() {
                    var phoneNumber = $("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_PhoneNumberSelector").intlTelInput("getNumber", window.intlTelInputUtils.numberFormat.NATIONAL);
                    inner.phoneNumber(phoneNumber.replace(/-/g, ""));
                    var countryData = $("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_PhoneNumberSelector").intlTelInput("getSelectedCountryData");
                    inner.phonePrefix(countryData ? countryData.dialCode : "");
                };

                inner.phoneNumber = ko.observable("");
                inner.phonePrefix = ko.observable("");

                inner.countries = ko.observableArray([]);
                inner.states = ko.observableArray([]);
                inner.creditCards = ko.observableArray([]);
                inner.installments = ko.observableArray([]);

                inner.skipPaymentUpdate = false;

                inner.enableVisaDebit = ko.observable(false);
                inner.enableInstallments = ko.observable(false);

                inner.countries = ko.utils.arrayMap(countries, function(item) {
                    return new Country(item);
                });

                inner.creditCards = ko.utils.arrayMap(creditCardOptions, function(item) {
                    return new CreditCard(item);
                });

                inner.selectedCreditCard.subscribe(function() {
                    inner.skipPaymentUpdate = true;
                    inner.setInstallments();
                    inner.skipPaymentUpdate = false;

                    $.publish('payment/ingenicoCreditCardPaymentUpdated');
                });

                inner.selectedInstallment.subscribe(function() {
                    if (!inner.skipPaymentUpdate) {
                        $.publish('payment/ingenicoCreditCardPaymentUpdated');
                    }
                });

                inner.setInstallments = function() {
                    var maxInstallments = 1;
                    $.each(creditCardOptions, function(index, element) {
                        if (element.Code === inner.selectedCreditCard()) {
                            maxInstallments = element.MaxInstallments;
                        }
                    });

                    if (maxInstallments === 1) {
                        inner.installments([new Installment(1)]);
                        return;
                    }

                    var installments = [];
                    var i = 1;
                    for (i = 1; i &lt;= maxInstallments; i++) {
                        installments.push(new Installment(i));
                    }
                    inner.installments(installments);
                };

                inner.showStates = ko.observable(false);
                inner.selectedCountry.subscribe(function () {
                    try {
                            var country = inner.selectedCountry();
                            ezy.defaultAjax("/FCPassengerDetailsPart/GetStates", { country: country }, inner.setCountryStates, inner.failedGettingCountryStates);
                            $("#CreditCardPayment_StateDrop").trigger("change.select2");

                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error in selectedCountry.subscribe ex:" + e);
                    }
                });

                inner.showStates = ko.observable(false);
                inner.setCountryStates = function (states) {
                    inner.states(states);
                    inner.showStates(states.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; (inner.selectedCountry() === "US" || inner.selectedCountry() === "CA"));
                    if (inner.selectedCountry() === "US" || inner.selectedCountry() === "CA") {
                        $("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_Zip").rules("add", {
                            required: true,
                            messages: {
                                required: "You need to enter a zip code"
                            }
                        });
                    }
                    else {
                        $("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_Zip").rules("remove", "required");
                    }
                };

                inner.failedGettingCountryStates = function () {
                    console.log("Failed getting states for selected country.");
                };
                inner.setSelectedCountry = function(countryToSelect) {
                    //if (countryToSelect) {
                    //    countryToSelect = inner.countries[0].name;
                    //}

                    //var country = $.grep(inner.countries, function(e) { return e.name === countryToSelect; });
                    //if (country.length === 1) {
                    //    inner.selectedCountry(country[0]);
                    //}

                    //$("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_CountryDrop").trigger("change.select2");
                };

                inner.setSelectedState = function(stateToSelect) {
                    //var state = $.grep(inner.states(), function(e) { return e.name === stateToSelect; });
                    //if (state.length &gt;= 1) {
                    //    inner.selectedState(state[0]);
                    //} else {
                    //    inner.selectedState("");
                    //}

                    //$("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_StateDrop").trigger("change.select2");
                };

                return inner;
            };

            var creditCardViewModel = new viewModel();
            ko.applyBindings(creditCardViewModel, document.getElementById("ingenico-creditcard-payment"));
            creditCardViewModel.selectedCountry.valueHasMutated();
            //creditCardViewModel.selectedCountry("CO");
            window.ingenicoCreditCardViewModel = creditCardViewModel;

            $("#IngenicoCreditCardPayment_PhoneNumberSelector").on("countrychange", function(e, countryData) {
                window.ingenicoCreditCardViewModel.updatePhoneNumber();
            });

        });
    </script>
    <div id="safetyPayOnline" class="payment safety-pay-online box">
        <div class="paymentHead" data-paymenttype="SP">
                <div class="paymentIconWrapper">
                    <i class="icon icon-SafetyPay-PSE-logo"></i>
                </div>

                <input value="CO" type="hidden" id="SafetyPayOnlinePayment_Country" name="SafetyPayOnlinePayment.Country" />

            <div class="confirmText">Yes, I confirm my travel details as illustrated above are correct</div>
        </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {
            var Country = function(item) {
                var inner = {};
                inner.name = item.Text;
                inner.code = item.Value;
                return inner;
            };

            var viewModel = function() {
                var inner = {};
                var countries = [{"Selected":false,"Text":"Colombia","Value":"CO"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Peru","Value":"PE"}];
                inner.selectedCountry = ko.observable();

                inner.countries = ko.observableArray([]);
                $.each(countries, function () {
                    var country = new Country(this);
                    inner.countries.push(country);
                });

                inner.selectedCountryCode = ko.computed(function() {
                    var code = inner.selectedCountry() !== undefined ? inner.selectedCountry() : "";
                    return code;
                });

                return inner;
            };

            var safetyPayOnlineViewModel = new viewModel();
            ko.applyBindings(safetyPayOnlineViewModel, document.getElementById("safetyPayOnline"));
            window.safetyPayOnlineViewModel = safetyPayOnlineViewModel;
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {
            var Country = function(item) {
                var inner = {};
                inner.name = item.Text;
                inner.code = item.Value;
                return inner;
            };

            var viewModel = function() {
                var inner = {};
                var countries = [{"Selected":false,"Text":"Brasil","Value":"BR"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Canada","Value":"CA"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Chile","Value":"CL"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Colombia","Value":"CO"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Costa Rica","Value":"CR"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Ecuador","Value":"EC"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"España","Value":"ES"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Estados Unidos","Value":"US"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Mexico","Value":"MX"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Peru","Value":"PE"},{"Selected":false,"Text":"Portugal","Value":"PT"}];
                inner.selectedCountry = ko.observable();

                inner.countries = ko.observableArray([]);
                $.each(countries, function () {
                    var country = new Country(this);
                    inner.countries.push(country);
                });

                inner.selectedCountryCode = ko.computed(function() {
                    var code = inner.selectedCountry() !== undefined ? inner.selectedCountry() : "";
                    return code;
                });

                return inner;
            };

            var safetyPayCashViewModel = new viewModel();
            ko.applyBindings(safetyPayCashViewModel, document.getElementById("safetyPayCash"));
            window.safetyPayCashViewModel = safetyPayCashViewModel;
        });
    </script>

                <div class="importantNotice">
                    <p>Con la elección de este medio de pago, autorizo expresamente a FAST COLOMBIA S.A.S – VIVA AIR, para que deduzca de mi nómina de julio el valor de COP $ 34.000 por cada VivaElegido inscrito conforme a la política de la Compañía definida como Programa VivaElegidos. Este valor será descontado en 01 (una) cuota.</p>

<p>De esta manera, autorizo a FAST COLOMBIA S.A.S – VIVA AIR, para que en caso de terminación de mi contrato de trabajo por cualquier causa, me sean descontados los saldos insolutos a la fecha de retiro, de la liquidación final de prestaciones sociales, bonificaciones, indemnizaciones, etc., que me correspondan del valor que adeude a la fecha de finalización del contrato de trabajo por este concepto. <div id="paymentSummary">
    <div id="payment-summary" class="box">
        <div id="paymentSummaryHeader">
            <div>Tu compra</div>
            <div class="clear"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="additionalInfo">
            Por favor revisa los detalles del vuelo seleccionado antes de pagar
        </div>
        <div class="clear"></div>

        <div id="paymentSummarySegments" data-bind="visible: basket.BookingType() !== 'GiftCardPurchase' &amp;&amp; basket.BookingType() !== 'StaffTravelRenewal' &amp;&amp; !basket.IsChangeBooking()">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6">
                <div class="segmentHeader">
                    Vuelo ida
                    <span data-bind="if: basket.IsOutChanged()">Nuevo vuelo</span>
                </div>
                <div class="segmentDate">
                    <span data-bind="text: basket.BoardDateText"></span>
                </div>
                <div class="segmentFlightNo" data-bind="visible: basket.OutboundSegments().length === 1">
                    <span data-bind="text: basket.FlightNumberOut"></span>
                </div>
                <div class="segmentDetail" style="position: relative;">

                <div class="price" data-bind="html: $root.basket.TotalAmountIncludingFeesPriceString()"></div>
                <div class="clear"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- /ko -->

        <div class="clear"></div>

                <div class="infoContainer">
                    <div>Los precios pueden variar en comparación a la suma total debido a que cada precio se convierte a la moneda seleccionada. El valor pagado siempre reflejará el precio correcto en el momento de la compra y lo que verás en tu extracto bancario.</div>

                </div>

        <script>
            function loadBoxeverScript(url, callback) {
                if (window.LoadBoxeverScripts) {
                    var script = document.createElement("script");
                    script.type = "text/javascript";

                    if (script.readyState) { //IE
                        script.onreadystatechange = function () {
                            if (script.readyState === "loaded" ||
                                script.readyState === "complete") {
                                script.onreadystatechange = null;
                                if (typeof callback === "function") {
                                    callback();
                                }
                            }
                        };
                    } else { //Others
                        script.onload = function () {
                            if (typeof callback === "function") {
                                callback();
                            }
                        };
                    }

                    script.src = url;
                    document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(script);
                } else {
                    if (typeof callback === "function") {
                        callback();
                    }
                }
            }
        </script>
